post_detail.description: Click 3X created the show open for VH1's hit reality show, T.I & Tiny.  To create the time-lapse effect of each family member on the bed we began by editing together multiple takes to push the narrative, then composited each shot into a clean take of the bed in Flame.
post_detail.title: TI and Tiny Show Opening

assets.description: Click 3X created the show open for VH1's hit reality show, T.I & Tiny.  To create the time-lapse effect of each family member on the bed we began by editing together multiple takes to push the narrative, then composited each shot into a clean take of the bed in Flame.
